title: Sitemap causing strain on your Lahitapiola.fi server

profile.name: LocalTapiola
profile.about: LocalTapiolaâ€™s products and services cover non-life, life and pension insurance, as well as investment and saving services.

vulnerability_information:
## Basic report information
**Summary:** 
Your sitemap isn't split into many other sitemaps which causes all of the sitemap URL's to start loading in just 1 Sitemap which in turn causes a big strain on your server. 

**Description:** 
It took more than 5 minutes just to load your sitemap.  That is not normal.  

**Impact:**
Servers can lockup because of this.  Look at this Github discussion about a similar issue to yours which has caused servers to lockup for another Webmaster experiencing the same issue as yours. 

https://github.com/maartenba/MvcSiteMapProvider/issues/258

## Browsers / Apps Verified In:

Google Chrome

## Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Visit http://lahitapiola.fi/sitemap.xml or https://lahitapiola.fi/sitemap.xml
  2.  You will notice just how long it takes to load your sitemap.  It takes so long that every hit on your server for Sitemap request, will harm your server CPU and other resources. 

## Additional material

 To reduce load, the sitemap can be split into many sitemaps. 

## Related reports, best practices

## Impact

This impacts your ability to run your web applications efficiently and will thus affect your ability to run your business smoothly.
vulnerability_information_html:
Basic report information

Summary:
Your sitemap isn't split into many other sitemaps which causes all of the sitemap URL's to start loading in just 1 Sitemap which in turn causes a big strain on your server.

Description:
It took more than 5 minutes just to load your sitemap. That is not normal.

Impact:
Servers can lockup because of this. Look at this Github discussion about a similar issue to yours which has caused servers to lockup for another Webmaster experiencing the same issue as yours.

https://github.com/maartenba/MvcSiteMapProvider/issues/258

Browsers / Apps Verified In:

Google Chrome

Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Visit http://lahitapiola.fi/sitemap.xml or https://lahitapiola.fi/sitemap.xml
  2. You will notice just how long it takes to load your sitemap. It takes so long that every hit on your server for Sitemap request, will harm your server CPU and other resources.

Additional material

To reduce load, the sitemap can be split into many sitemaps.

Related reports, best practices

Impact

This impacts your ability to run your web applications efficiently and will thus affect your ability to run your business smoothly.

activities.message:
Thanks a lot for reporting this potential issue back to us. LocalTapiola takes security very seriously and would appreciate if you would not share any information about this report until we have determined whether this is a bug and what any potential impact (or fix) will be.

Our security team will take a look at this issue as soon as possible. We aim to respond to your report as soon as possible, but due to the complexity of the systems, triaging many times can take a long time. We prioritize issues -  reports containing trivial issues with limited (or no) business impact and badly written reports with insufficient information on how to reproduce the issue receive a lower priority. Please do not request updates for at least 20 days into the process. Once triaged and verified, bounty decisions are made 1-2 times per month.

*Note: if we frequently dismiss your reports, make sure you have read our policy and stay in scope and that you know how to write good reports - https://support.hackerone.com/hc/en-us/articles/211538803-Step-by-Step-How-to-write-a-good-vulnerability-report and http://blog.bugcrowd.com/advice-for-writing-a-great-vulnerability-report/. Also, our policy contains a lot of information on what is relevant and what is not.*

activities.message: This is triaged as far as the symptom goes, we are not sure whether or not this is an actual problem. I did try to initiate about 10 sitemaps and it had zero performance impact on the server. We are investigating.
activities.markdown_message: This is triaged as far as the symptom goes, we are not sure whether or not this is an actual problem. I did try to initiate about 10 sitemaps and it had zero performance impact on the server. We are investigating.

activities.message: The bounty is our standard for "few request much processing" issues.
activities.markdown_message: The bounty is our standard for "few request much processing" issues.

activities.message:
I found something else that is interesting and has an effect on your business. I can send email message from your server without being logged in at all.  I just did a test message and it went through.  Something is not configured about your secure.lahitapiola.fi website  It even allows file attaching which poses a security risk to you.  If you also find this a valid flaw, you can add another bounty for me if you so desire.  I also want to note here, that CGI is outdated, you can see in screenshot that Index.cgi is visible and CGI bins are often hackable.  Read here for the newer technologies that have been replaced with CGI bins.  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1162029/what-are-cgi-scripts-used-for-these-days

 Thanks
activities.markdown_message:

If you also find this a valid flaw, you can add another bounty for me if you so desire. Read here for the newer technologies that have been replaced with CGI bins. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1162029/what-are-cgi-scripts-used-for-these-days

Thanks

activities.message: Sending email using the secure email service is the purpose of the secure email service. Works as intended.
activities.markdown_message: Sending email using the secure email service is the purpose of the secure email service. Works as intended.

activities.message: I was under the assumption that me not even being logged in, can send a message from your server.  That is not something that I find normal.  Never heard of such a thing, that is why I pointed it to you.  Is that even normal for anyone to get on that and just send a message from your server? What if I put a bot to send thousands of messages or hundreds of thousands, that causes a strain on your server? I think it should block anyone from even sending any message to any lahitapiola.fi email address, that way your server won't be strained.  Or at least put a Captcha on it.

What if I put a bot to send thousands of messages or hundreds of thousands, that causes a strain on your server? I think it should block anyone from even sending any message to any lahitapiola.fi email address, that way your server won't be strained. Or at least put a Captcha on it.

activities.message:
K I believe I found something new that is serious.  I am able to cause an Internal Server Error on your server, and this means I was able to successfully affect your server side PHP or other code to get confused or to glitch and show this error. This error is not supposed to happen at all, seeing this error means something about your backend code is misconfigured.  Just visit https://secure.lahitapiola.fi/index?ripplepaperwallet.com"/>

The correct behavior that is supposed to happen is that your server should ignore the extra parameters I passed on, and should instead redirect me to another page, or not do anything and just keep me on the same original page.  See screenshot please.  I do believe this one has an impact on your business.
activities.markdown_message:
K I believe I found something new that is serious. I am able to cause an Internal Server Error on your server, and this means I was able to successfully affect your server side PHP or other code to get confused or to glitch and show this error. This error is not supposed to happen at all, seeing this error means something about your backend code is misconfigured. Just visit https://secure.lahitapiola.fi/index?ripplepaperwallet.com%22/%3E

The correct behavior that is supposed to happen is that your server should ignore the extra parameters I passed on, and should instead redirect me to another page, or not do anything and just keep me on the same original page. See screenshot please. I do believe this one has an impact on your business.

activities.message: It's an error page. There is no business impact.
activities.markdown_message: It's an error page. There is no business impact.

activities.message: K can you close this as originally valid? or do you still have it open for other reasons Thanks
activities.markdown_message: K can you close this as originally valid? or do you still have it open for other reasons Thanks

activities.message: We are tracking internal work efforts through this report, so keeping it open. The functionality will most likely be renewed but the schedule for this is still open.
activities.markdown_message: We are tracking internal work efforts through this report, so keeping it open. The functionality will most likely be renewed but the schedule for this is still open.

activities.message: Hey, we have a fix ready for you to test in production - if you care to have a look?
activities.markdown_message: Hey, we have a fix ready for you to test in production - if you care to have a look?

activities.message: Sure I will check it.  I will analyze it again.
activities.markdown_message: Sure I will check it. I will analyze it again.

activities.message: I just analyzed it, and it is perfect.  No strain anymore as it loaded very fast and instantly instead of dragging for a long time.
activities.markdown_message: I just analyzed it, and it is perfect. No strain anymore as it loaded very fast and instantly instead of dragging for a long time.

activities.message: Thanks, normally in cases like this where the hacker does extra for the team, the team adds an additional $$ amount for the hackers extra work.  And sure if you like to disclose it publicly you can do so. Feel free.

summaries.content:
##Issue

The reporter found inconsistencies in response times when requesting the sitemap. The sitemap was generated on the fly in a way that consumed resources more than necessary.

##Fix

The sitemap functionality was rewritten.

##Reasoning

The flaw was very simple and even simpler to exploit. The actual impact was small, but in theory was available for wrongdoings.
summaries.content_html:
Issue

The reporter found inconsistencies in response times when requesting the sitemap. The sitemap was generated on the fly in a way that consumed resources more than necessary.

Fix

The sitemap functionality was rewritten.

Reasoning

The flaw was very simple and even simpler to exploit. The actual impact was small, but in theory was available for wrongdoings.
